title: Implement Salesforce Hook Integration
summary: Introduces a Salesforce Hook to facilitate seamless data extraction and loading between Airflow and Salesforce.

title: Slack API Notification Integration
summary: Implements Slack API integration for sending task status updates and alerts directly to Slack channels.

title: Develop Data Mapping Strategy for External APIs
summary: Implements a data mapping strategy to ensure seamless integration and data transformation between Airflow and various external APIs.
